alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley; Oldham (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 9:44PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Cimarron, northern Oldham, Dallam and Hartley Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 944 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Texline to 8 miles northwest of Romero to near Nara Visa to 12 miles east of Logan. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dalhart, Hartley, Texline, Channing, Ware, Felt, Conlen, and Romero. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for the Panhandle of Oklahoma...and the Panhandle of Texas.
